title: Security Guard
description: Responsible for ensuring the safety and security of premises, staff, and visitors by monitoring and patrolling the area.
requirements: Prior experience in security is preferred but not mandatory.
Ability to work in shifts, including nights and weekends.

title: Supervisor - Security Team
description: Lead and manage a team of security guards to ensure smooth operations and adherence to security protocols.
requirements: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in security management.
2+ years of experience in a supervisory role.
Ability to handle emergencies and make quick decisions.
Proficiency in basic computer operations for reporting purposes.

title: Security Guard - Night Shift
description: Provide security during night shifts by monitoring premises, performing patrols, and responding to incidents as needed.
requirements: Strong communication and conflict resolution skills

title: Security Analyst
description: Analyze security systems, identify vulnerabilities, and work with teams to enhance physical security measures.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in criminal justice, security management, or related field.
2+ years of experience in security analysis or a related role.
Familiarity with security tools and technologies.
